Package com.tu2.hrshare.employee

Class EmployeeController

java.lang.Object
com.tu2.hrshare.employee.EmployeeController
@RestController public class EmployeeController extends Object
Controller class handling requests to interact with the Employee database.

  • Method Details

    • getEmployees

      @GetMapping("/api/v1/employees") public List<Employee> getEmployees()
      Endpoint for retrieving all employees from the database.
      Returns:
      List Employee

    • getSingleEmployee

      @GetMapping("/api/v1/employee/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Employee> getSingleEmployee(@PathVariable Long id)
      Endpoint for retrieving a single employee from the database
      Parameters:
      id - Path variable to determine the correct employee.
      Returns:
      Optional Employee

    • postEmployee

      @PostMapping("/api/v1/new/employee") public void postEmployee(@RequestBody Employee employee)
      Endpoint to insert a new employee into the database.
      Parameters:
      employee - The new Employee object to be added into the database.

    • updateEmployee

      @PatchMapping("/api/v1/update/employee/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Employee> updateEmployee(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody Employee updatedEmployee)
      Endpoint to update a whole employee or update it partially and save it in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the respective employee.
      updatedEmployee - The employee with possibly new data that is used to update the database entry.
      Returns:
      Updated element or error code if the object cannot be found.

    • deleteEmployee

      @DeleteMapping("api/v1/delete/employee/{id}") public void deleteEmployee(@PathVariable Long id)
      DeleteMapping to delete an employee by ID. After deletion, it redirects to the home page.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the employee to delete.
